basic.description: An examination of selected aspects of Canadian politics and government, including institutions and behavioural approaches. The focus of this course will vary from year to year; consult the departmental website for further details.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Topics in Canadian Politics

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 on all units in POLS) or permission of the department.
